patterns.name: research-agent-purple-panel-display
patterns.description: Display purple-bordered panels for research agent delegation. In node_processor.py Phase 2, parse tool_args from research_agent_tasks. Extract query, directories (default ['.']), max_files (default 3). Format markdown: **Query:** {query}, **Directories:** {dirs}, **Max files:** {max}. Call 'await ui.research_agent(panel_text)' for each agent BEFORE execute_tools_parallel(). Shows distinct purple panels with query details. Do NOT use streaming_panel.update() - causes jumbled output.
